cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yatou

sentence.kanji: 新しい社員を雇いました。
sentence.romaji: atarashii shain wo yatoimashita
sentence.english: We employed a new staff member.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's rikutsu

sentence.kanji: 彼には理屈が通じない。
sentence.romaji: kare ni ha rikutsu ga tsuujinai
sentence.english: He doesn't understand logics.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bushi

sentence.kanji: 被災地に物資を送ったよ。
sentence.romaji: hisaichi ni bushi wo okuta yo
sentence.english: We sent supplies to the disaster area.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's araimono

sentence.kanji: 母は台所で洗い物をしています。
sentence.romaji: haha ha daidokoro de araimono wo shite imasu
sentence.english: Mother is doing the dishes in the kitchen.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shomotsu

sentence.kanji: 彼は書物に囲まれて生活しているの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shomotsu ni kakomarete seikatsu shite iru no
sentence.english: He lives surrounded by books.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nyoubou

sentence.kanji: 女房は実家に帰っています。
sentence.romaji: nyoubou ha jika ni kaete imasu
sentence.english: My wife is back at her parents' home.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kamotsu

sentence.kanji: このトランクは貨物で送ろう。
sentence.romaji: kono toranku ha kamotsu de okurou
sentence.english: Let's send this trunk by freight.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's modosu

sentence.kanji: 話を戻しましょう。
sentence.romaji: hanashi wo modoshimashou
sentence.english: Let's go back to what we were talking about.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's torimodosu

sentence.kanji: 緑を取り戻す必要があります。
sentence.romaji: midori wo torimodosu hitsuyou ga arimasu
sentence.english: We need to recover our green spaces.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haraimodosu

sentence.kanji: 飛行機の運賃が払い戻されたの。
sentence.romaji: hikouki no unchin ga haraimodosareta no
sentence.english: My airfare was reimbursed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iiwake

sentence.kanji: あなたは言い訳が多すぎます。
sentence.romaji: anata ha iiwake ga oosugimasu
sentence.english: You give too many excuses.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wake

sentence.kanji: そんな訳で、私は仕事を辞めました。
sentence.romaji: sonna wake de watashi ha shigoto wo yamemashita
sentence.english: I quit my job for that reason.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's okujou

sentence.kanji: 屋上から富士山が見えました。
sentence.romaji: okujou kara fujisan ga miemashita
sentence.english: Mt. Fuji could be seen from the rooftop.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's butai

sentence.kanji: 謎の物体が空を飛んでいます。
sentence.romaji: nazo no butai ga sora wo tonde imasu
sentence.english: A mysterious object is flying in the sky.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shokubutsu

sentence.kanji: 休日は植物の世話をして過ごします。
sentence.romaji: kyuujitsu ha shokubutsu no sewa wo shite sugoshimasu
sentence.english: I spend my days off looking after my plants.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's youi

sentence.kanji: 彼はその問題を容易に解決したわ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha sono mondai wo youi ni kaiketsu shita wa
sentence.english: He easily solved the problem.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shokubutsuen

sentence.kanji: 植物園には珍しい花がたくさんありますね。
sentence.romaji: shokubutsuen ni ha mezurashii hana ga takusan arimasu ne
sentence.english: There are a lot of rare flowers in the botanical garden.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's okure

sentence.kanji: 電車が10分遅れで到着したんだ。
sentence.romaji: densha ga ju pun okure de touchaku shita n da
sentence.english: The train arrived ten minutes late.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's butsuri

sentence.kanji: 彼は物理を専攻している。
sentence.romaji: kare ha butsuri wo senkou shite iru
sentence.english: He majors in physics.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kenbutsunin

sentence.kanji: 見物人が大勢集まっているね。
sentence.romaji: kenbutsunin ga oozei atsumate iru ne
sentence.english: Many spectators have gathered.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's moreru

sentence.kanji: 彼のヘッドフォンから音が漏れているね。
sentence.romaji: kare no hedofuon kara oto ga morete iru ne
sentence.english: Sound is leaking from his headphones.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's morasu

sentence.kanji: 秘密を漏らしたのは彼です。
sentence.romaji: himitsu wo morashita no ha kare desu
sentence.english: He's the one who leaked the secret.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's moru

sentence.kanji: 天井から雨が漏るの。
sentence.romaji: tenjou kara ame ga moru no
sentence.english: Rain is leaking from the ceiling.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oru

sentence.kanji: 母は今、うちに居りません。
sentence.romaji: haha ha ima uchi ni orimasen
sentence.english: My mother isn't at home now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's doukyo

sentence.kanji: 私はまだ両親と同居しています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha mada ryoushin to doukyo shite imasu
sentence.english: I still live with my parents.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's isou

sentence.kanji: 雨が一層激しくなったね。
sentence.romaji: ame ga isou hageshiku nata ne
sentence.english: The rain got even heavier.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kousou

sentence.kanji: このあたりは高層ビルが増えましたね。
sentence.romaji: kono atari ha kousoubiru ga fuemashita ne
sentence.english: The number of high-rise buildings has increased around here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taisou

sentence.kanji: 彼は大層喜んでいました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha taisou yorokonde imashita
sentence.english: He was extremely pleased.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's rireki

sentence.kanji: 最近使ったファイルは、履歴からすぐ開けます。
sentence.romaji: saikin tsukata fuairu ha、 rireki kara sugu hirakemasu
sentence.english: You can easily open recently used files from the history folder.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's rirekisho

sentence.kanji: 面接のために履歴書を書きました。
sentence.romaji: mensetsu no tame ni rirekisho wo kakimashita
sentence.english: I wrote out my resume for the interview.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's garasudo

sentence.kanji: お店のガラス戸が割られたんだ。
sentence.romaji: omise no garasudo ga warareta n da
sentence.english: The shop's glass door was broken.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's todana

sentence.kanji: この皿を戸棚にしまってください。
sentence.romaji: kono sara wo todana ni shimate kudasai
sentence.english: Please put away this plate in the cupboard.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's otoshimono

sentence.kanji: 財布の落とし物を拾いました。
sentence.romaji: saifu no otoshimono wo hiroimashita
sentence.english: I picked up an abandoned wallet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's horu

sentence.kanji: ここに穴を掘りましょう。
sentence.romaji: koko ni ana wo horimashou
sentence.english: Let's dig a hole here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hei

sentence.kanji: 猫が塀の上で寝ているぞ。
sentence.romaji: neko ga hei no ue de nete iru zo
sentence.english: The cat is sleeping on top of the wall.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hakimono

sentence.kanji: 履物は靴箱に入れてください。
sentence.romaji: hakimono ha kutsubako ni irete kudasai
sentence.english: Please put your footwear in the shoe cupboard

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's doro

sentence.kanji: 靴が泥だらけになったよ。
sentence.romaji: kutsu ga dorodarake ni nata yo
sentence.english: Her shoes were covered with mud.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kami

sentence.kanji: 彼は神を信じている。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kami wo shinjite iru
sentence.english: He believes in God.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's osaeru

sentence.kanji: ドアを押さえてください。
sentence.romaji: doa wo osaete kudasai
sentence.english: Please hold the door.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shakai

sentence.kanji: これは大きな社会問題になっている。
sentence.romaji: kore ha ooki na shakai mondai ni nate iru
sentence.english: This is a major social issue.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's todoku

sentence.kanji: 昨日、父から手紙が届いた。
sentence.romaji: kinou chichi kara tegami ga todoita
sentence.english: I got a letter from my father yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's todokeru

sentence.kanji: これを彼に届けてください。
sentence.romaji: kore wo kare ni todokete kudasai
sentence.english: Please send this to him.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's moushikomu

sentence.kanji: 彼女はそのセミナーに申し込んだ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha sono semina- ni moushikonda
sentence.english: She registered for that workshop.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kudamono

sentence.kanji: デザートに果物を食べましょう。
sentence.romaji: deza-to ni kudamono wo tabemashou
sentence.english: Let's have fruit for dessert.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kadai

sentence.kanji: 夏休みの課題は何ですか。
sentence.romaji: natsuyasumi no kadai ha nan desu ka
sentence.english: What's our summer assignment?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ka

sentence.kanji: 今から課のミーティングがある。
sentence.romaji: ima kara ka no mi-teingu ga aru
sentence.english: Our division is going to have a meeting now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's riyuu

sentence.kanji: 遅れた理由を教えてください。
sentence.romaji: okureta riyuu wo oshiete kudasai
sentence.english: Please tell me why you were late.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jiyuu

sentence.kanji: 今日は自由な時間が多い。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha jiyuu na jikan ga ooi
sentence.english: I have a lot of free time today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's matsuri

sentence.kanji: 彼女は祭りが大好きです。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha matsuri ga daisuki desu 。
sentence.english: She loves festivals.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaisha

sentence.kanji: 彼は小さな会社に勤めています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha chiisa na kaisha ni tsutomete imasu
sentence.english: He's working for a small business firm.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's abura

sentence.kanji: 水と油は混ざらない。
sentence.romaji: mizu to abura ha mazaranai
sentence.english: Oil and water don't mix.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jinja

sentence.kanji: 京都には神社がたくさんある。
sentence.romaji: kyouto ni ha jinja ga takusan aru
sentence.english: There are many Shinto shrines in Kyoto.
